name: thinkmay-client
description: ***Required [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/) v16+** ``` npm install ``` # SCRIPT 1. Normal start: ``` npm start ``` 2. Start with **nodemon** (will display error stack trace in **error page**) ``` npm run dev ``` 3. Debug server (use flag "--inspect-brk", visit "edge://inspect" or "chrome://inspect" for more information) ``` npm run debug ``` # CONFIG PATHS
